author: emeliasarfo2
title: Grow Afriteen, grow Cardano ERGhana
description: Cardano blockchain knowledge is almost negligible among the youth in the Eastern Region of Ghana in particular.
solution: To educate about 300 youth (both High School and Tertiary in Eastern Region, Ghana) on Cardano and it's opportunities.
experience: WADA team of Community Advisors, Mentor and Educationists, Marketers, Entrepreneurs, Teachers
